China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 3 月 16 日星期六 13:17:57 GMT 120
Huawei says Chery's Luxeed S7 delays will be resolved in AprilHuawei said that a shortage of semiconductors and factory relocation issues that had delayed production and deliveries of its Luxeed S7 sedan should be resolved from next month, local media outlet Cailianshe reported on Saturday. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 11:53:52 GMT FVMODZ5QWZIG7D75ALH6CUWFX4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/huawei-says-cherys-luxeed-s7-delays-will-be-resolved-april-2024-03-16/Reuters技术
'Turn around immediately': Taiwan warns off Chinese coast guard boats again as tensions simmerTaiwan on Saturday warned off Chinese coast guard ships that entered its restricted waters near frontline islands close to China for a second day in a row, as tensions simmer across the sensitive Taiwan Strait. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 07:09:23 GMT ZXL2KUNZM5NS7LO4EOQG3AOS7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/turn-around-immediately-taiwan-warns-off-chinese-coast-guard-boats-again-2024-03-16/Yimou Lee, Fabian Hamacher世界亚太地区
Fiji upholds China policing agreement, Guardian Australia reportsFiji will maintain a policing cooperation deal with China after a review of the agreement which has sparked concern in Australia, the Guardian Australia news site reported. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 05:27:17 GMT ADWOPOQFRVKE3E4LM5DJA6UDZA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/fiji-upholds-china-policing-agreement-guardian-australia-reports-2024-03-16/Reuters世界亚太地区
Jail terms of up to 7 years for 12 who stormed Hong Kong legislature in 2019A Hong Kong court on Saturday sentenced 12 people to jail terms from more than four years to nearly seven years in a high-profile rioting case linked to the storming of the city legislature during a pro-democracy protest in 2019. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 03:39:53 GMT 3NBGLH3K35JZNDTUBY3LSAXOPQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/twelve-sentenced-jail-storming-hong-kong-legislature-2019-2024-03-16/Jessie Pang, Edward Cho世界亚太地区
Australia PM to talk wine tariffs with China Foreign MinisterAustralia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Saturday the removal of Chinese tariffs on Australian wine would be on the agenda when he meets China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi next week in Canberra. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 00:51:58 GMT OCTCKJ3LYRMN3BMBEPSGRK2P6I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-pm-talk-wine-tariffs-with-china-foreign-minister-canberra-2024-03-16/Reuters世界亚太地区
TikTok urges US users to call senators to vote no on TikTok banTikTok displayed a notification to some U.S. users on Friday, urging them to call their senators and ask them to vote no to a bill that would ban the popular short-form video app if it is not divested from Chinese tech company ByteDance. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 18:39:57 GMT F52TATRICRNWLCCL45UC6Q3H5A https://www.reuters.com/technology/tiktok-urges-us-users-call-senators-vote-no-tiktok-ban-2024-03-15/Sheila Dang, Nazli Togrul技术
